summary: Adds real light sources to the sign posts of Weathered Road Signs.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3][color=#fff2cc]DESCRIPTION[/color]
[/size][/b]
This mod adds real light sources to the sign posts' lanterns of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2810/?]Weathered Road Signs[/url]. The original mod only had a few lanterns with light sources, and most of those wouldn't work properly. This ensures all sign posts that had the lanterns are covered with a consistent lighting setup.


[b][size=3][color=#fff2cc]REQUIREMENTS[/color]
[/size][/b]
Updated Skyrim
Weathered Road Signs


[b][color=#fff2cc][size=3]CREDITS

[/size][/color][/b]sms2002sms for the original mod. I was given permission by the original author to upload this.
author: Pharros
